name: American Airlines
description: When you think of airlines, technology may not be the first thing that comes to mind - but whether powering our planes, airports or internal systems, our IT/Engineering experts are pushing the limits of innovation. What does it feel like to develop technology that flies? This is your chance to find out.

name: State Farm
description: Work with a Good Neighbor. We work in an agile environment to quickly iterate and develop solutions that meet the needs of our Company and customers. We test and use cutting-edge technologies such as open source full stack development, mobile applications, and big data solutions.
